name: Complete Blood Count (CBC)
description: A complete blood count test measures several components of blood including red blood cells, white blood cells, hemoglobin, hematocrit, and platelets. Used to detect a wide range of disorders.
preparationInstructions: No fasting required. Normal diet and water intake is allowed.

name: Lipid Profile
description: Lipid profile test measures the amount of cholesterol and triglycerides in the blood. It helps assess cardiovascular health and risk of heart disease.
preparationInstructions: Fasting for 10-12 hours is required. Only water is allowed during fasting period.

name: Thyroid Profile (T3, T4, TSH)
description: Thyroid function test measures thyroid hormone levels to evaluate thyroid gland function and diagnose thyroid disorders like hypothyroidism or hyperthyroidism.
preparationInstructions: No fasting required. Can be done at any time of the day.

name: Blood Sugar Fasting (FBS)
description: Measures blood glucose level after an overnight fast. Used to diagnose diabetes and prediabetes conditions.
preparationInstructions: Fasting for 10-12 hours is mandatory. Only water is allowed.

name: Blood Sugar PP (Postprandial)
description: Measures blood glucose level 2 hours after a meal. Helps monitor diabetes control and treatment effectiveness.
preparationInstructions: Sample should be collected exactly 2 hours after starting your meal.

name: HbA1c (Glycosylated Hemoglobin)
description: Reflects average blood sugar levels over the past 2-3 months. Essential for diabetes diagnosis and monitoring.
preparationInstructions: No fasting required. Can be done at any time.

name: Liver Function Test (LFT)
description: Evaluates liver health by measuring enzymes, proteins, and bilirubin levels. Helps detect liver diseases and damage.
preparationInstructions: Fasting for 8-10 hours is recommended.

name: Kidney Function Test (KFT)
description: Assesses kidney function by measuring waste products and electrolytes in blood. Helps detect kidney diseases.
preparationInstructions: No fasting required. Normal water intake is allowed.

name: Vitamin D (25-OH)
description: Measures vitamin D levels in blood. Vitamin D deficiency can lead to bone problems, fatigue, and weakened immunity.
preparationInstructions: No special preparation required.

name: Vitamin B12
description: Measures vitamin B12 levels. Deficiency can cause anemia, neurological problems, and fatigue.
preparationInstructions: No fasting required.

name: Iron Studies
description: Comprehensive test to assess iron levels, iron-binding capacity, and ferritin. Helps diagnose anemia and iron disorders.
preparationInstructions: Fasting for 8-10 hours recommended. Morning sample preferred.

name: Urine Routine & Microscopy
description: Examines physical, chemical, and microscopic properties of urine. Detects urinary tract infections, kidney diseases, and diabetes.
preparationInstructions: Collect first morning urine sample in a clean, sterile container.

name: Dengue NS1 Antigen
description: Early detection test for dengue fever. Detects dengue virus protein in the first few days of infection.
preparationInstructions: No fasting required. Most accurate in first 5 days of fever.

name: Dengue IgG & IgM Antibodies
description: Detects dengue antibodies to determine current or past dengue infection.
preparationInstructions: No fasting required. Most effective after 5 days of fever.

name: Malaria Rapid Test (MP)
description: Rapid detection of malaria parasites in blood. Quick screening test for malaria diagnosis.
preparationInstructions: No special preparation required.

name: COVID-19 RT-PCR
description: Gold standard test for COVID-19 diagnosis. Detects viral RNA from nasopharyngeal swab.
preparationInstructions: No eating, drinking, or smoking 30 minutes before sample collection.

name: Prostate Specific Antigen (PSA)
description: Screening test for prostate health in men. Elevated levels may indicate prostate cancer or enlargement.
preparationInstructions: Avoid sexual activity 48 hours before test. No vigorous exercise.

name: Electrolytes (Na, K, Cl)
description: Measures essential electrolytes in blood. Important for kidney function and fluid balance assessment.
preparationInstructions: No fasting required.

name: C-Reactive Protein (CRP)
description: Measures inflammation marker in the body. Elevated in infections, autoimmune diseases, and inflammatory conditions.
preparationInstructions: No special preparation required.

name: ESR (Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate)
description: Measures rate at which red blood cells settle. Indicates inflammation and infection in the body.
preparationInstructions: No fasting required.
